verbose_text: In addition to ITZ, other azole family antifungal drugs, including posaconazole, ketoconazole, fluconazole, and voriconazole, also inhibit hCYP51 and CYP3A4 with slightly lower or similar potency as ITZ.
evidence: azole family antifungal drugs, including posaconazole, ketoconazole, fluconazole, and voriconazole            , also inhibit hCYP51 and CYP3A4
